name: cutesy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
artificially attractive and pleasant, especially in a childish way: She sent me one of those awful birthday cards with a cutesy kitten on it.

Add to word list
Add to word list
artificially attractive and charming, esp. in a way suitable for a child: The house is full of cutesy pictures of kittens.
